channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why crypto OG Dan Morehead believes investors should look beyond Bitcoin
item.description: A former hedge fund manager, Morehead started Pantera, one of the first crypto investment firms.

item.title: American fertility rate hits all-time low
item.description: The new statistic is on par with fertility rates in western European countries, according to World Bank data.

item.title: Plane Crashes in Russia’s Far East, Killing All 49 Onboard

item.title: Inside the world of ‘timepiece tourists,’ who spend tens of thousands of dollars on luxury watch-themed vacations
item.description: “You can buy high-end commercial watches almost everywhere, but for anyone who’s a true connoisseur, they go to Switzerland."

item.title: Christian Cancel Culture Strikes Again
